title: Get BRAND Node by ID
user_story:
As an API consumer \
When I only have the ID of a brand\
I want to be able to load that brand\
So I can find out its name and other information
description:
# **Response **

**happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (200)
* a simple JSON with the ID and all core properties of the node:
  * `id`: integer
  * `name`: string
  * `full_name`: string/null
  * `founded`: integer/null
  * `defunct`: integer/null
  * `wmi`: string/null
  * `hsn`: string/null

**unhappy path**

* negative HTTP status code (404)
* a plain text response stating the problem

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business logic)**

* an existing node can be loaded successfully
* error when a non-existing node is requested

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* meta information, like `created_at` or `updated_at`
* relationships with other nodes (e.g. car models or company)
* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
